name: Ext_R4B_GuidanceResponse_evaluationMessage
title: Cross-version Extension for R4B.GuidanceResponse.evaluationMessage for use in FHIR R5
description: This cross-version extension represents GuidanceResponse.evaluationMessage from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/GuidanceResponse|4.3.0 for use in FHIR R5.

element.short: Messages resulting from the evaluation of the artifact or artifacts
element.definition: Messages resulting from the evaluation of the artifact or artifacts. As part of evaluating the request, the engine may produce informational or warning messages. These messages will be provided by this element.
element.comment: `GuidanceResponse.evaluationMessage` maps to R5 `GuidanceResponse.evaluationMessage`. Changed from an array to a single value (max cardinality from * to 1). So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.
